txt.en: 'During your time away from camp, all could hear the sounds of destruction carrying from the west, and this put the guards on alert. It is known that the Orcs burned and pillaged much of the land as their armies marched westward, yet naught since had we heard the roar of carnage so close.\n\n'We know not who may still dwell in the remaining homes and farms west of the road, but they are certainly in grave danger once more. I believe that a worthy [placeholder], such as yourself, ought to lend aid to any there in need.'
'Who approaches? You are unfamiliar to me, [placeholder], but please, you must help me! Oh, what strength can you offer?'
Smoke and the sounds of battle have carried to the trader's outpost from the west. Ofrith worries for the safety of the men still dwelling in the region.
You have discovered a frightened man behind the large farm
Travel towards the farmhouses and search for any in need of aid
The farmhouses in peril are south-west of the trader's outpost.\n\nOfrith has asked you to carefully search among the farmhouses to the west for signs of any remaining farmers who may be in danger.
The farmhouses in peril are south-west of the trader's outpost.\n\nYou have discovered a man at one of the large farmhouse estates who seems to be in need of your aid.
